types.html:
Nuit des Longs Couteaux f (uncountable)

  1. Night of the Long Knives
  2. (Canada, politics, historical) The Night of the Long Knives, the night of November 4, 1981, in which the federal and nine provincial governments, in the absence of Quebec, reached the Kitchen Accord for the patriation of the Canadian Constitution
trans: The Night of the Long Knives, the night of November 4, 1981, in which the federal and nine provincial governments, in the absence of Quebec, reached the Kitchen Accord for the patriation of the Canadian Constitution

title: Nuit des Longs Couteaux
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /nɥi de lɔ̃ ku.to/
